subject: JUnit, Ant and Eclipse issue
msgSnippet: Hello all, here is my problem : one of my tests opens an IE (Internet Explorer) window. If I run the whole test campaign within Eclipse, no problem, the IE
messageBody:
Hello all,
here is my problem :

one of my tests opens an IE (Internet Explorer) window.

If I run the whole test campaign within Eclipse, no problem, the IE
window is opened, the campaign is executed...

I've tried to integrated the campaign execution in my Ant build
script to run the tests after each build.

And my problem is the <junit></junit> part of the script is stopped
at the end of the campaign until I close the opened IE window.

I've put some code after the junit section to kill IE, but as the
script never exits from this junit section, I can't do anything.

Any solution ?

Thanks for your help.
